I always use Acethinker Screen Recorder Online to capture gameplay for my YouTube channel, it works fairly well all the time. Acethinker is a free web-based application to record computer screen right from the browser, you don't have to download or install anything.  And here are the steps to use Acethinker to record screen Step 1. Run your web browser and visit Acethinker Screen Recorder website ( https://acethinker.com/free-screen-recorder ), this app compatibles with IE, Firefox, Chrome, Safari, Opera, etc. Step 2. Click 'Start' to run the screen recording app. Step 3. Select the recording mode you like, Full screen record or Region record. Step 4. Click on the red button to start the screen recording. Step 5. Once you stop the recording, you can click on "Show in folder" to find the recorded video.
